title: Countries with the highest inflation rate 2019
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Inflation rate compared to previous year in the y axis.
The maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year 200000.0 is found at Country Venezuela and the minimum is found at Mongolia where Inflation rate compared to previous year is 9.03.
There is a difference of 199990.97 between the maximum Country Venezuela and minimum Country Mongolia.
